ftplib::FTP

ftplib::FTP Class Reference

This class tries to imitate the ftplib.FTP python class, with a few differences. More...

Detailed Description

This class tries to imitate the ftplib.FTP python class, with a few differences.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ftplib::FTP::FTP ( const std::string &  host = "",
const std::string &  user = "",
const std::string &  passwd = "",
double  timeout = 0.0 
)

constructor

Parameters:
host if not empty it connects to given hostname
user if not empty it calls FTP::login(user, passw)
passwd login password
timeout if not empty it calls FTP::settimeout(timeout)

socketpp::Socket & ftplib::FTP::transfercmd ( const std::string &  cmd  ) 

initiate a transfer over the data connection, using PASV or PORT mode depending on previous calls to set_pasv() (default is PASV), and then send given command

Parameters:
cmd FTP command to execute
Returns:
